steps.name: [Complete Uninstall Process] NPM Package Uninstall
[Complete Uninstall Process] Step 1: Uninstall the NPM Package
[Complete Uninstall Process] Step 2: Remove Custom Commands
[Complete Uninstall Process] Step 3: Remove Hooks
[Complete Uninstall Process] Step 4: Remove AI Subagents

[Complete Installation Process] NPM Package Installation
[Complete Installation Process] Step 1: Install Claude Code (if not already installed)

[Complete Installation Process] Step 3: Deploy Core Commands

[Complete Installation Process] Step 5: Configure Settings
[Complete Installation Process] Step 6: Install Experimental Commands (Optional)

[Security Considerations] Set Up Hooks (Optional)
